SELECT mentorNum, m.memberNickname, mentorSubject, mentorContent, mentorPrice, ableDay, sTime, eTime FROM mentor mt JOIN member m ON mt.memberEmail = m.memberEmail WHERE mentorNum = #{mentorNum}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mentoringApply (mentoringNum, mentorNum, memberEmail, mentoringPrice, mentoringDate, status, phoneNum, applyMessage, applyDate) VALUES ( MENTORINGAPPLY_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{dto.mentorNum}, #{dto.memberEmail}, #{dto.mentorPrice}, '${dto.mentoringDate}', 0, #{dto.phoneNum}, #{dto.applyMessage}, SYSDATE )
mapper.select: SELECT mentorRate, mentorReviewContent FROM mentorReview WHERE mentoringNum IN ( SELECT mentoringNum FROM mentoringApply WHERE mentorNum = #{mentorNum} )
